dcterms:description: The DMLab-30 benchmark suite is a multi-task reinforcement learning environment designed to evaluate the performance of reinforcement learning algorithms on various tasks, including memory-based and reactive tasks.
dcterms:title: DMLab-30

dcterms:creator: Jan Humplik

dcterms:description: The Numpad environment is a continuous control task where the agent must learn to activate a specific sequence of numbers by interacting with a 3x3 number pad.
dcterms:title: Numpad

dcterms:description: The Memory Maze is a memory-based navigation task where the agent must discover the location of an apple in a maze.
dcterms:title: Memory Maze
